none.name: Core Rules Only
none.description: Standard 10th Edition Crusade rules with no supplement.

pariah_nexus.name: Pariah Nexus
pariah_nexus.description: The Nephilim War. Harvest Blackstone Fragments, form alliances of Seekers, Protectors, or Interlopers, and battle across three campaign phases using Strategic Footings.

resources.name: Blackstone Fragments
resources.description: Noctilith shards harvested from the Pariah Nexus. Spend to purchase Crusade Blessings, Warlord XP, or unique relics.

resources.name: Campaign Points
resources.description: Points earned by your alliance during each campaign phase. The alliance with the most at the end of each phase earns Strategic Points.

allianceTypes.name: Seekers
allianceTypes.description: Those who seek to harvest the blackstone and end the Stilling. Imperial forces are best suited.

allianceTypes.name: Protectors
allianceTypes.description: Those who wish to protect the blackstone from others. Necrons and those with their own goals for noctilith.

allianceTypes.name: Interlopers
allianceTypes.description: Chaos warlords, Aeldari raiders, Ork marauders, and others drawn to the Pariah Nexus.

strategicFootings.name: Defensive
strategicFootings.description: Dig in and hold your ground.

crusadeBlessings.name: Single-Minded Seeker
crusadeBlessings.description: After each game where the bearer is your Warlord, roll a D6 (add +2 if you won). On a 6+, gain 3 Blackstone Fragments.

crusadeBlessings.name: Neuro-Emitter
crusadeBlessings.description: Once per battle, in your opponent's Shooting phase or at the start of the Fight phase, select up to three friendly units. Until end of phase, those units have Feel No Pain 5+ against Psychic Attacks.

crusadeBlessings.name: Acquisitive Opportunist
crusadeBlessings.description: Warlord gains ability based on Strategic Footing: Aggressive = Scouts 6", Balanced = Lone Operative, Defensive = Stealth.

crusadeBlessings.name: Empathic Disinclinator
crusadeBlessings.description: Before battle, select one objective marker. Friendly units within range of that marker have a 5+ invulnerable save.

crusadeBlessings.name: Empyrically Polarised Blackstone
crusadeBlessings.description: During the Select Strategic Footing step, after selections are revealed, you may change your Strategic Footing. Once per campaign phase.
